mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, content, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.username FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
